title: LoL won't work on my macbook!
body:
I've downloaded everything but when I click to play it shows the 'League of Legends" logo (as it would upon usual start up) but nothing else happens. No windows open. nothing... 
I'm stuck at my in laws house for the next few days with NOTHING to do. Please help me!

replies.body:
Word of warning - I'm not familiar with Mac myself, but I've asked around and have an initial suggestion.

If the League of Legends logo comes up, and the game doesn't launch after that - it might simply be a case of some background League processes still running.

Try clearing all League processes (using Activity Monitor), or completely rebooting your macbook?

Cheers
Mindstar
SO it ended up working but now the patcher gets stuck at 2% and 0kbps. What the flim flam mcgee is going on? lol
